document_data.mainbody: Genbo Trang was a merchant in the city of Tu Pe in Koryo around 1357 DR. He had a business standing hard against the north wall of the city, next to the North Watch Inn. He had an adjoining "yard".Genbo Trang is only briefly mentioned on the Tu Pe map key. It also refers to his "yard", with quotation marks, but it is an open question what is meant by this.
